description: The Wasabi Power battery and charger kit includes 2 batteries and one charger with a European plug and car adapter. All items meet or exceed OEM standards and come with a 3-year manufacturer warranty.Batteries replace: Sony NP-FV100Charger replaces: Sony BC-TRV.Compatible with the following Sony models:DCR-SR15DCR-SR21DCR-SR68DCR-SR88DCR-SX15DCR-SX21DCR-SX44DCR-SX45DCR-SX63DCR-SX65DCR-SX83DCR-SX85FDR-AX100HDR-CX105HDR-CX110HDR-CX115HDR-CX130HDR-CX150HDR-CX155HDR-CX160HDR-CX190HDR-CX200HDR-CX210HDR-CX220HDR-CX230HDR-CX260VHDR-CX290HDR-CX300HDR-CX305HDR-CX330HDR-CX350VHDR-CX360VHDR-CX380HDR-CX430VHDR-CX520VHDR-CX550VHDR-CX560VHDR-CX580VHDR-CX700VHDR-CX760VHDR-CX900HDR-HC9HDR-PJ10HDR-PJ30VHDR-PJ50HDR-PJ200HDR-PJ230HDR-PJ260VHDR-PJ340HDR-PJ380HDR-PJ430VHDR-PJ540HDR-PJ580VHDR-PJ650VHDR-PJ710VHDR-PJ760VHDR-PJ790VHDR-PJ810HDR-TD10HDR-TD20VHDR-TD30VHDR-XR150HDR-XR155HDR-XR160HDR-XR260VHDR-XR350VHDR-XR550VHXR-NX3D1UHXR-NX30UHXR-NX70UNEX-VG10NEX-VG30, VG30HNEX-VG900
